name: Beardy the Digger
description:
Beardy the Digger is an exciting adventure in atmospheric locations that will allow you to discover the genre of platformer from a new perspective. Take a trip to uncharted gloomy dungeons, to the dangerous foot of the mountain, overcome various obstacles on the way to the main goal to return home.

Key features of the game


Diverse gameplay, which includes puzzles, passing levels on speed and reaction. You shall not forget potions with an unexpected effect!
.

Various locations, mysterious dungeons, roaring fjords and many others;
.

Colourful graphics, embodied with the latest technology from Unity 2019 to create a warm lamp light;
.

Sound effects, immersed in an atmosphere of adventure and danger.
.
